message:
SYSTEM: Presentationvictor.pdf: Página 26
PROPOSAL. Use of MVCO. Architecture of a generic platform 
• The MVCO acting as a triple store and authorisation resolver, 
in contact with the other elements in a typical DRM platform. 
26 
Note that this schema (without the MVCO) is the essential one of the so called Digital 
Rights Management system. Note, too, that licenses are usually written in the so called 
Rights Expression Language
speaker: SYSTEM
